instruction: any good funny movies about summer camps or theater?
output: If you're into quirky comedies about summer camps and theater vibes, you’ve gotta check out Theater Camp! 🎭 It’s all about a wild group trying to save their beloved camp after the founder falls into a coma — so much laughs and heart! 😂🌟
